text:
@PressSec There is no evidence to prove that Herman Cain was affected the Covid-19 in Tulsa Rally.

Moreover, the incubation period of the Covid-19 may be more than 14 days.

Herman Cain would be very unhappy to hear such rumors in Heaven. 

GOD STANDS WITH HERMAN CAIN !
